products.name: MUGO E88 Pro Drone 4k HD foldable With Camera Mini 720p Live Video Drone
products.description: Frequency: 2.4G Channel: 4CH Motor: 816 Coreless Motor Quadcopter Battery: 3.7V 1800mAh Lipo (Included) Transmitter Battery: 3x 1.5 AA Battery Flying time: 10-30 mins(Approx) Charging time: 100mins R/C Distance: 100m Color: Black Dual Camera: 1080P / 4K Quad's Size: 25*20*5.5 CM (the arms not folded) 12.5*8*5.5 CM (the arms folded) Function: Up/down, Forward/backward, Turn left/right, Sideward flight, 3-level flight speed, LED Light, Headless Mode, One Key Automatic Return, Altitude Hold Mode, WiFi FPV, Trajectory Flight, Feature: -Trajectory Flight. Draw a flight way on the screen, and the drone would conduct an autonomous flight along the designated way. -2.4GHz Technology Adopted for Anti-Interference. -4 Channel which can ascend, descend, forward, backward, left sideward fly, right sideward fly, and rolling 360?. -6-axis gyro which can have more stable flying and be easy to control. -The quadcopter fuselage is made of high-strength and resistant engineering plastics, lightweight and durable resistance. Camera/Video -With Headless Mode, no need to adjust the position of aircraft before flying. Dual Camera: 480P HD WiFi FPV with a secondary Optical Camera (For Top View). Stability: Position Locking (Fixed point hovering) with a Secondary camera to sense it?s surrounding and assist 6 Axis gyro for next-level stability One-Key-Return and Head-Less: So that you don?t worry about losing your Drone. One Key Take-Off / Landing: to fly like PRO with safety. Longer Battery Life: 1600 mAh battery gives you longer flight time for more fun. Three-speed level: Beginner, Moderate, and Sports for racing mode. 3D Flip Stuns: in all directions with just one click. Dual Control Mode: Fly with a 2.4 GHz Remote or Smartphone WiFi APP (Fly even without the Remote) Photos/Videos: Capture amazing Photos/Videos and store them directly to your smartphone. Foldable: Makes it easy to carry.

Whether you're a beginner or an expert, this drone makes a fantastic gift for anyone looking to explore the skies. FEATURES: Optical Visual Hovering, 4K HD 1080p Wide Angle Lens, Hand Gesture Selfie. It has 3 adjustable speed levels (from low to high, beginners to experts), One Key Take Off/Landing (beginner-friendly), 360°Flip (fun trick in the sky) - a perfect gift for families and friends!

products.name: N&M Store H35 Fold Drone 2.4G 4K Ultra HD Dual Camera Wifi 360° Drone
products.description: H35 Fold Drone ?: A Comprehensive Overview The H35 Fold Drone ? is a sophisticated, user-friendly drone that caters to both novice pilots and seasoned drone enthusiasts. Its blend of advanced features, foldable design, and robust performance makes it an attractive choice for various aerial activities, from casual flying to professional-grade photography. This comprehensive overview delves into the key aspects that define the H35 Fold Drone ?, providing a detailed understanding of its capabilities and functionalities. Design and Build One of the standout features of the H35 Fold Drone ? is its foldable design. This innovative construction allows the drone's arms to fold inward, significantly reducing its size for easy storage and transport. When folded, the drone fits comfortably into a small bag or backpack, making it an ideal companion for travel and outdoor adventures. The drone is crafted from durable, lightweight materials that provide a balance between sturdiness and portability. The sleek and aerodynamic design not only enhances its aesthetic appeal but also improves flight efficiency by reducing air resistance. Camera and Imaging Equipped with a high-definition camera, the H35 Fold Drone ? is designed to capture stunning aerial footage. The camera typically offers resolutions ranging from 1080p to 4K, ensuring crisp and clear images and videos. Some models come with an adjustable or gimbal-stabilized camera, which significantly reduces vibrations and shakiness, resulting in smooth and professional-grade footage. The wide-angle lens captures a broad field of view, allowing users to take expansive landscape shots and immersive videos.

products.name: MUGO E88 drone 1080p 4k Drone
products.description: E88 Pro Foldable 4K Camera WiFi FPV Drone in White brings an array of cutting-edge features to elevate your aerial experience. Designed for versatility and ease of use, this drone boasts an impressive suite of functionalities. With its Selfie Gesture Mode, capturing stunning photos becomes effortless; simply make a gesture to trigger the camera. Plan precise routes using the Set Flight Path and enjoy hands-free navigation with Motion Control and Trajectory Flight options. Achieve perfect stability with Spin Fine Tuning and Fixed Height Control, while Image Flipping adds creative flair to your shots. The Auto Hover feature ensures steady positioning, while the ability to add music enhances your video content. Switch between Speed Modes for varied flying experiences and activate Emergency Stop for immediate halts. Equipped with an HD Camera, this drone delivers stunning 4K visuals and enables you to click photos and record videos seamlessly. Its Foldable Wings enhance portability, and the 360 Flip Stunt feature brings an extra element of fun to your flights. Navigate with ease using Headless Mode and execute smooth take-offs and landings with One Key functions. Direction Control and Fine Tuning allow precise handling, while Zoom capability brings subjects closer with clarity. E88 Pro is a comprehensive drone that combines advanced features with user-friendly operation for an unparalleled aerial adventure.
